title: Lord of my life, thy quickening ray

verses.text:
Lord of my life, thy quickening ray
Sheds on my path the glow of day;
Star of my hope, thy softened light
Cheers the long watches of the night.

Sun of my life, thy quickening ray
Sheds on my path the glow of day;
Star of my hope, thy softened light
Cheers the long watches of the night.
